title: Retail investors are continuing to buy the dip in tech despite recent turmoil, says TD Ameritrade - CNBC
content: Retail investors are continuing to buy the dip in tech despite recent turmoil, says TD Ameritrade  CNBC
description: Retail investors have continued to buy the dip in the recent market turmoil, liking tech despite the sector rout, according to TD Ameritrade's AJ Kahling.
